text: <@UJL4N3WN8> we have found problems with some client browsing with some outlook versions

That's interesting. Thanks :)

What about with accessibility, dark theme compatibility or custom layouts?

I have found there are design limitations like background colours, borders, column widths, padding etc., no way to add custom CSS like the classic editor. I would assume yes there's more code for sure (that's pretty much the norm with most D&D editors), can't control anything for accessibility like `role="presentation"` since you can't access the code at all.
Yep those were my thoughts too but just wanted to be sure I wasn't missing something obvious before writing about that. Thanks!
